roleset.name: regulation of osmotic pressure

example.name: osmoregulate-v
example.text: Saltwater fish osmoregulate by transporting salt out of their blood and into the surrounding water through specialized cells in their gills .

propbank.arg: by transporting salt out of their blood and into the surrounding water through specialized cells in their gills

example.name: osmoregulation-n
example.text: For logistical reasons , very little information on the osmoregulation of cetaceans exists ; the majority of data are confined to dolphins and porpoises .

example.name: osmoregulation-n
example.text: In humans the kidney plays a huge part in the osmoregulation of the body 's internal environment .

example.name: osmoregulation-n
example.text: Studies designed specifically to document the effect of exogenous oestrogen and progesterone on thirst and vasopressin osmoregulation in a small group of young women with primary ovarian failure indicate that these steroid hormones are without any influence on osmoregulation ( Baylis 1988 ) .

example.name: osmoregulatory-j
example.text: Bacteria cells use osmoregulatory proteins as emergency valves to respond to changes in the osmotic pressure of their external environment .

roleset.note: OSMOREGULATE-V NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.
